website_summaries.verdict: This battery set packs serious punch as many users claim the twin-pack to be even more powerful than the original Makita-branded batteries.
pros: Charges easily on original Makita charger in a quick manner
Has an impressive lifespan, even with moderate to heavy usage
Comes as a 2-pack 14.4V batteries that work with Makita 1433, 1434, 1435, 1435F, 192699-A , and 193158-3
cons: Somewhat difficult to remove from drill
Battery may get hot after extended use

customer_reviews.title: Awesome batteries
customer_reviews.text: So far I've bought replacement batteries for Makita, Black and Decker, and DeWalt tools. I've replaced the original NiCd batteries with NiMh batteries from Expert power, and in all cases they have had better life and much better run time than the original batteries at about half the price. Just be sure that your charger will handle the NiMh batteries. The black and decker and Makita chargers I had worked fine, but the Dewalt had to be replaced. No problem, you can by a new charger from these guys too. Excellent company, Excellent batteries. Just save the caps from the old ones to reuse with the new ones.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Built to die in two years?
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe that these batteries only lasted two years and that was with minimal use cycles too! I for one do not know how they get such a high rating given that they seem to just all of a sudden...DIE. Year one, great, year two fail. Charge them up go to use them, get one or two (with luck) screws put in and they just wind down to slug pace and finally give up all juice. The red Engitech units purchased years before these still work fine, although they don't hold a charge for as long as they used to. I suspect it is time to upgrade to Lithium-Ion batteries which means a whole new drill. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwibru

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, drill is very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Using these on a Makita MXT 14.4 and their 14.4 impact driver. Excellent so far. 4 stars instead of five, because they are DREADFULLY hard to remove from the drill itself. The pinch-clips fit far too tightly, hopefully they will wear down a bit in time. EDIT, January 2015---- Batteries still fine. Just as good or better than the originals. I don't use them daily, but when I do use them, I use them very heavily. No complaints at all. They also are not hard to remove from the drill anymore like they were originally. When I first got them, you basically had to be Thor to get them off, but now they come off normally.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Mine lasted more than 5 years...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set of these for my Makita 14.4 V drill set in December 2012, when the original batteries started failing after about 3 years - and they're just now starting to weaken. I don't work my drills to death, but do perform average household/farm tasks on a frequent basis, use in my woodworking shop, and build the occasional fence & deck. These batteries have held on longer than I really expected, and I'm ordering another set to keep these tools in service just a while longer...
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Power and fast charge, holds the charge longer than my original batteries did! Reasonably priced @ 2 for less than the price of 1 original Makita battery at the big box stores. I don't see how you can go wrong, you won't be disappointed or at least I wasn't!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last 2 days to 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: 1 battery went bad and wouldnt charge within 2 days of using, less than a year later the other battery did the same thing. The original batteries tha th are 8 years old still work, may be weak but still work. Dont recommend buying unless you want to replace them almost immediately and waste your money. Double thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Make It To Two Years Before They Wouldn't Hold A Charge
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of positive reviews about these batteries and they weren't the cheapest ones on Amazon, so I thought they'd be good, long-lasting batteries. Unfortunately, they won't hold a charge after 20 months of very light use. The charger shows a green light after a few minutes but their voltage drops rapidly. So rapidly that I can't even drive in 4 screws before they're dead. My Makita batteries lasted around 10 years. If you're okay with replacing batteries every year or so, then you might be happy with them. But if you're expecting OEM performance and longevity, they'll fall short of the mark.
customer_reviews.author: R Bosque

customer_reviews.title: Give a old favorite drill a new life ,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the batteries about 2 months ago and so far they have exceeded my expectations. They seem to have as much power as the makita original 14.4 batteries . I had these drills for years and was sad when the original batteries finally gave up the ghost , I can speak for longevity on 2 9.6 v stick batteries I bought 2 years ago and still are running strong
customer_reviews.author: gary l

customer_reviews.title: Fits just like OEM
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These fit exactly like the OEM batteries at half the cost. They also have slightly more mAh than OEM which shows in how long they last before needing a charge. These are replacing my OEM batteries which are about 4 years old, so time will tell in how long these hold out before needing replacement. The OEM charger works fine with them. If these last three years, I'd buy them again. If they only last two, it's not worth the cost savings. So, again, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tech-Support-79

customer_reviews.title: May have charging issues
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great deal, but I've bought third party replacement batteries before that didn't perform anything like the original and the casings separated after a few uses. I tried charging both of these batteries in the kit and the second one showed an error message at first. I switched chargers and it seemed to charge up without error. I'll try using them and see if they work as promised and amend this review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Snoho

customer_reviews.title: Batteries for older Makita drill driver
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Makita drill for a long time, it is an excellent size and weight. Both original batteries failed after years of use and I was going to, reluctantly, replace the drill when I found these batteries. They fit pefectly, the capacity is identical to the original batteries and the battery life is now back to what it used to be. The batteries plug into the original charger. Now I have my favourite Makita drill/driver back again! Thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gent

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: These new batteries work well with my Makita driver and drills. The mechanical connections that clip the batteries onto the tools work very well, unlike some other aftermarket batteries I've used. Time will tell how well they hold up to repeated charge and discharge cycles, but so far they seem to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I have bought these before and they were good. this batch however was not
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before and they were good. this batch however was not. they wont hold a charge which suggest to me that the manufacturing has ben compromised for the sake of profit. your better off to spnd more for one good battery than to by these
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D. Cushman

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price but not as good as the originals
customer_reviews.text: Definitely don't last as long as the originals did but seem similar to the OEM ones, which were now made in China vs Japan, I got as my first set of replacements several years ago. I'm guessing those must have sat on a shelf a couple years. I assume these have not, but there is no way these are 3000mAh vs the OEM 2600mAh.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to beat for the price. I'm in the middle of a home remodel, my $80 Makita battery dies, I find this and got 2 batteries for less than the price of 1 from Makita. I charged them and have been using them every day for 2 weeks straight and have had no problems. They last as long as the Makita's from what I can remember, when they were new.
customer_reviews.author: KAOS

customer_reviews.title: Great First Impression
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in great condition. The batteries were made well and the materials seemed as good as the OEM battery that came with my Makita drill. They should handle the impacts, drops and scrapes that a construction area would throw at them. I placed them immediately on the Makita charger. After charging I test each battery out and seemingly were fine and the lights of my charger confirmed that they were in good condition. Time will tell though as the quality becomes evident after a few months of use. I will update later with more information as I have a project on the back burner that will require extensive use of my drill.
customer_reviews.author: Casch

customer_reviews.title: Much better batteries than some after markets i have tried to use.
customer_reviews.text: Spring clips hold battery securely to tool. They work well and take full charge and hold it for extended periods. For me 4 weeks and still get full expected use of batteries after sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Del K. Rykert

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting batteries for Mikita
customer_reviews.text: These have been great - 3000mAh vs. the original 2200mAh. A charge lasts a long time. Only complaint: bottom of batteries' clips come off easily and the bottom of the battery can also fall off. I just used some duct tape and that solved it. The charging capability outweighs that case defect.
customer_reviews.author: David Mullins

customer_reviews.title: I'm back to work without being tethered to an extension cord nor air hose!
customer_reviews.text: I've been without the use of several Makita tools because of weak batteries, & unable to find replacement batteries, until now. I've been able to use them for about a week because of these replacements. Right out of the box & they are still charged, using them daily. Who says that bunny has the best batteries! I'll rate the longevity & battery life when I use them more. I may wear out before these batteries do. ☺
customer_reviews.author: SJW52

customer_reviews.title: Good batteries
customer_reviews.text: These batteries work nicely and have held up well. Brought the old Makita drill back to life. Very satisfied with my purchase. **UPDATE** I bought these batteries back in 2014 and both are still going strong. They charge in the Makita charger nicely and power the drill extremely well. I have left these batteries sitting for extended periods, they charge perfectly. I have run these batteries hard, drilling 1/2 inch holes through 6 inches of pressure treated lumber and they (and the drill) just keep going. Absolutely no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: Use them every day and they work way better then other replacement batteries I've tried. Not as good as the original of course but. Still a really good replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For weeks my husband was complaining about his drill and he deduced that the problem was the charger was fine; the batteries wer
customer_reviews.text: Instant gratification with my Makita cordless drill. For weeks my husband was complaining about his drill and he deduced that the problem was the charger was fine; the batteries were not. Voila! In 2 days I had two charged batteries for him. He was going great. Then my son came over to borrow the drill...so much for those pressing repairs that needed doing. Maybe next week....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Price was best of anywhere I looked
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Price was best of anywhere I looked. The drill and drive set are over 10 years old. I had been looking for inexpensive battery replacement and rebuilt cost as much as new, around $80. This is basically 2 for the price of 1. The 10% AH reduction was well worth the 50% savings. They recharge great with my 10yr old charger.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Ray Womack

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have found these Makita replacement batteries
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have found these Makita replacement batteries, Have not had the opportunity to really give them a work out yet. They charged fast and had more power than I expected. I would buy these again and I would also recommend.
customer_reviews.author: slz

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit wary of off brand batteries but so far I'm very pleased. They hold a charge and perform at least as well as the originals and Waaaay less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, had a few yrs now and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, had a few yrs now and they are performing as expected and saved me from having to replace a perfectly functional drill just cuz the original batteries finally gave out.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for about two months now, they hold a charge nicely, somewhat longer than the original batteries and take any a few extra minutes to charge fully. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great battery for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a few months now under heavy use. The only issue is that the batteries tend to get a little hot if used for extended periods of time continuously. This is expected though, and if you pay attention, and let them cool off, they are just fine. Charge is lasting, and works with the regular Makita chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Tayt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: We ran 78 5/16 x 5 1/8 GRK structural screws on the first full charge / first use of one of these bats with the impact driver. I and others were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Allen

customer_reviews.title: better than original
customer_reviews.text: No joke, better than original. Lasted longer, initial charge stayed longer even through a week of non use no degrade in drill performance. used multiple time for kitchen remodel and still on initial charge. Drill speed increased, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective Solution
customer_reviews.text: These replacement batteries are better than the original, more milli-amps. These are a cost effective way to avoid buying a second driver-drill set. I have an 18V, and didn't want to spend another $280 for a second set. For just under $70, I extended the life of the 14.4v set. FYI you can make a simple mod to a 12V impact driver and these work great.
customer_reviews.author: trunyan

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with the batteries however one of the two would ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the batteries however one of the two would not take a charge. I talked to ExpertPower and they were very nice and helpful in directing me to the process of replacing the batteries. I am anxiously awaiting the arrival of the new ones. I think they will be fine and the price was great compared to what I could find locally.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Stimac

customer_reviews.title: Keep your old tools and use these batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit replacement for the OEM batteries that are no longer longer holding a charge after 12 years. I was considering buying new tools until I found these drop in replacement batteries at less than half the cost of the original batteries. They have more capacity than the originals and slide in a latch and unlatch perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Only four stars now because I haven't actually used them yet.
customer_reviews.text: As of this date I haven't actully used these batteries yet. They are my backups because the old red ones had "given up the ghost" of their power. I had some others simiar to these that worked very well. These have even more miliAmphours so I'm expecting them to do very very well.
customer_reviews.author: R2T4

customer_reviews.title: Makita Replacement Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Batteries work as specified however, they do stick a little going in and out of the manufactures (Makita) charger.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thornton

customer_reviews.title: not bad really. Will likely get another set
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 4 years, not bad really. Will likely get another set.
customer_reviews.author: 5Z

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I'm fully satisfied with these higher mAH replacement batteries. They charged right up in my Makita charger. Have not used them enough to know how long they will last, that will take years.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Makinson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: very similar to the worn out oem batteries, short shelf life, very short service time even after fresh charge, have tried 3 different chargers, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: New batterys
customer_reviews.text: Replaced three old battery, full charged around 10 min, ran it and it die around three minutes. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: They worked fine until recently
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2-pack on May 8, 2016. They worked fine until recently. One will no longer charge -- the Makita charger blinks an error.
customer_reviews.author: RickW

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: Work great saved me from having to waste money on a new drill.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Neill

customer_reviews.title: Don't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these batteries don't last. After about 9 months of occasional use, they have stopped taking a charge. They have a one year warranty, but the seller will not honor it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to buy a non-Makita batteries for my 2 drills. I would like to comment on only the two things that really matter to me. One is that these batteries are working very well and so far I haven't had any problems with them. And the other one is the price is significantly less when compared with the original brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Estrada

customer_reviews.title: good value and fast service
customer_reviews.text: These are replacements for batteries that are old, good value and fast service, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Benton

customer_reviews.title: Good price and perfect replacement for the oem batteries
customer_reviews.text: Good price and perfect replacement for the oem batteries. Both charged up perfectly and seem to last quite well. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Macloven

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and they work great after several recharges.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Charged up fine and run my old makita drill perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my old Makita 14.4v drill batteries that finally stopped holding a charge after 10 years. I really thought about just buying a new 18V drill, but decided to try out a couple new batteries for the old one before going the new drill route. If these last as long as the originals I'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Jester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: batteries charged up fast and are working great i am extremely satisfied with them
customer_reviews.author: Shad P.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good they charged up and fit correctly seem to have good power . Only time will tell how long they hold their ability to recharge .
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Schield

customer_reviews.title: fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: my 15 yo Makita drill and light work like new again!
customer_reviews.author: bob mills

customer_reviews.title: exact fit for my drills
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for my drills with NO issues whatsoever. I will order more , when i need them.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these batteries! They will drive in ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these batteries!They will drive in one screw per charge. Barely. Most worthless battery I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: bill T

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good amp hr for NiMh at a lower price than an oem.
customer_reviews.author: Horace Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them to much yet, but they seem to have good power and longevity
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: *** WARNING - THESE BATTERIES DO NOT FIT THE 6337D ****
customer_reviews.text: *** WARNING - THESE BATTERIES DO NOT FIT THE 6337D MODEL EVEN THOUGH THEY SAY THAT THEY DO. The battery would barely fit into the charger and would not fit into the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as replacements for the original batteries. I've had them for quite some time now and they've been better than expected. Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: hope these are better than the red fake makitas
customer_reviews.text: seems okay, but my last fake (red) makitas died after 12 months
customer_reviews.author: scott marrone

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Second set I buy, charge right up and ready to go. Excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It's nice to be able to use my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's nice to be able to use my tools all day without having to charge my battery. These batteries have a higher rating than the ones I bought a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: dsmryder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My originals died rather quickly, these have been going strong for the past year without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: AE2A

customer_reviews.title: Good replacements.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent batteries at a fraction of the cost of makitas
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rooney

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and charged them. Everything seems good. They look very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these batteries before from this vender and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these batteries before from this vender and they have preformed well.My only problem is with the warranty.When I tried to return one last December, they said the batteries were obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Savage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit, just as stated, and the power is great. Also fit the charger perfectly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bigdog51

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck !
customer_reviews.text: The replacement batterys from Expertpower were just as described and better, I beleve than OEM", they take a charge faster ,dont heat up wile charging, and fit the drill better, You won't beat the value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Batts.
customer_reviews.text: Work great with my tools. Charge time good and work well with the load.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorguy236

customer_reviews.title: What a charge!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the last couple I got. I could tell from two charges that they were top notch, more powerful and the charge lasted longer each time. Good work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald F. Markley

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time for these batteries. I purchased a set about 4 years ago, used them a lot, nice longevity
customer_reviews.author: david campbell

customer_reviews.title: An Appealing Option
customer_reviews.text: These non-Makita, Makita replacement batteries work exactly as they are supposed to a much lower cost than the Makita, Makita replacement batteries. With older equipment, the calculus of replacing worn-out batteries vs simply purchasing an entire new tool/battery set is often determined by the high price of the brand-name replacement batteries. These Expert Power batteries definitely made keeping the original tool set with new batteries and appealing option.
customer_reviews.author: pf

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative Great price
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about 2weeks now. Moderate to heavy usage. So far, so good. My original Makita batteries lasted 5 years before dying. Time will tell if these last as long. These are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Obi

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement batteries for Makita handheld drills
customer_reviews.text: These batteries provide a perfect replacement for aging Makita batteries at less than half the price. I've used both batteries for a quick project and they delivered on power. I haven't had to recharge them yet, but don't expect to see any issues. The side buttons for unlocking the battery also worked well, probably a little better even than stock Makita batteries. I think on the whole it was a little easier to slide these batteries out of the drill. Perfect replacement batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ball

customer_reviews.title: I thought my drill was a goner, then I found this.
customer_reviews.text: Could not find these batteries at a better price anywhere. Had tried to find some a few years back, no luck. Was really pleased to find these. Had resigned myself to paying $2-300 for a new drill, but made one last effort. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lowndes

customer_reviews.title: Like them!
customer_reviews.text: Batteries fit good. Able to charge and ready to use quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley R.

customer_reviews.title: OK for short term Not so good for more than a tear or two
customer_reviews.text: I probably don't have any right to complain here but my original Makita batteries lasted about 19 years. These have lasted just a bit over 2. I can charge them all night and they wont even screw in 1 three inch screw. They were about half the price of real ones but only about 1/10 the life. I wonder if the company that sold them is even still on here or has maybe changed names.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My original Ni-Cad batteries died and would no longer hold a charge. These babies last for weeks with moderate daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great so far. They charge great, hold a charge and fit my drills perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Craig from Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine But I haven't had the chance to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine But I haven't had the chance to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put them in my drills and they work fine. At this time I do not have any ...
customer_reviews.text: My Makita batteries came in quickly, I put them in my drills and they work fine. At this time I do not have any information on battery life or power. I'll let you know I a couple of months. Thanks again as I had these drills for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Greer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Better than old stock OEM for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the 14.4 batteries in July 2014. I noticed immediately that they had more voltage and much more capacity than the OEM batteries and were much cheaper. The fit perfectly in in the tool and the charger. Highly reccommended
customer_reviews.author: G.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Work well in my Makita drill. Provide plenty of power, less expensive than purchasing name brand. Would recommend to anyone who uses this type of tool.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best choice.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fits exactly like factory batteries, maybe better. I'm more than pleasantly satisfied. 5 out of 5 across the board except for price & value... Double points for that.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I wanted. How long they last is to be determined.
customer_reviews.author: Rube

customer_reviews.title: Better than original batteries
customer_reviews.text: Really hold a charge for a long time. Better than original batteries.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Replacement batteries for my Makita drill/driver
customer_reviews.text: I believe these batteries are better than the ones that came with my drill. They charge fast, but best of all they hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Russ of Badger Clan

customer_reviews.title: These are a great buy. I just purchased two more for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the same battery for a week, I couldn't believe how long it lasted. I drilled out 3 broken bolts from an exhaust manifold with the same battery, then continued to use it all week on regular nut and bolt jobs. These are a great buy. I just purchased two more for a guy at the shop. There better than makita.
customer_reviews.author: Angela N Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased OEM brand that did not last like the original
customer_reviews.text: They work well, but being new they should. Have purchased OEM brand that did not last like the original, so am trying these. Am cautiously optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: These batterys are just as good or better than my old makita ones. They were at my door in no time and work perfect. They also are 3.0 mah versus 2.6 mah on the stock ones. Very happy about the price.
customer_reviews.author: byron

customer_reviews.title: these batteries work great and are comparable to a new name brand battery ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these on a Burndy 6 ton hydraulic crimping tool, these batteries work great and are comparable to a new name brand battery at about half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Get new life with these batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great set of batteries.. I didn't realize that my old ones were so bad.. New life for my drill.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggersman

customer_reviews.title: like that they were totally charged and ready to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Was what I ordered, like that they were totally charged and ready to use out of the box. Real satified
customer_reviews.author: Cary Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when I started using them. Cheaper than buying rebuilt from batteries plus
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this battery, great value! They fit my Makita Impact Driver perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 3000 mAH way to go
customer_reviews.text: Better than original 2500 mAH plus these 3000 mAH are fresh and many recharges to go. Delivery was fast, price is good, and a definite to buy again. Expertpower and Amazon made it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Theses Batteries may be better than original, works great holds charge very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ironmaster

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great. They don't have quite the longevity of the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great. They don't have quite the longevity of the originals from Makita, are really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Busted Flush

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item appears to be OK Appear to have the same power level as the original ones did. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: 1retiredpappy

customer_reviews.title: Did nit hold charge as expected and after a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Did nit hold charge as expected and after a couple month would not take a charge. Stick to OEM batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wasylyk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, nice to have power instead of throwing units away
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good Batteries
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in fine shape. I've only got them charged up and haven't used them yet. However, I have no concerns about how they will function.
customer_reviews.author: anm108km

customer_reviews.title: batteries
customer_reviews.text: Came fully charged, which was great. I have not put them to a long-use test, as yet, to determine their performance, but I have no doubts they will be satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: ozone
